Message of Sympathy to Ukrainian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Ukrainian President
    Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of sympathy to Leonid Kuchma, president of Ukraine, in connection with the tragic gas-explosion at the Krasnorimanskaya Coal Mine of Ukraine which claimed huge casualties.
 Upon hearing this sad news I express deep sorrow and condolences to you and, through you, to all the victims and the bereaved families, the message said, and continued:    
 Sharing sorrow with you over the tragic accident, I hope that you and your government will eradicate the aftermath of the accident as early as possible and bring the living of the population in the affiliated area to normal.

articles.title: Greetings to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Egyptian President
    Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Mohamed Hosni Mubarak, president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, on July 22 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the July 23 revolution, the Egyptian people's national holiday.
 Expressing the belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the president and people of Egypt greater success in their work for the development and prosperity of the country, Arab unity and Mideast peace

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Egyptian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Egyptian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Ahmed Najef upon his appointment as prime minister of the Arab Republic of Egypt.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message sincerely wished him success in his new work.    
 DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to Ahmed Abu al-Gheit on his appointment as Egyptian foreign minister.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Czech Republic Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Czech Republic Appointed
    Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Ri Pyong Gap was appointed as DPRK ambassador e. p. to the Czech Republic, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
